feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.6 Alpine docker update
entry.content:
Hoping slower updates going forwards with extra features :)

Docker update to update alpine for security issues etc Reversion of Merge files fix to avoid file selection issues in other prompts

What's Changed

  • Revert "User Friendly Merge File Selection" by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1280
  • update alpine to v3.20.0 by @Zoey2936 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.5...v0.24.6

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.25.0 PDF.js update, HTTP2 support
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Various OAuth2 changes (Thanks @Ludy87 )
  • Various translations, Thanks all as always
  • Home page UI tweaks (flatter boxes) (thanks 'dev-cb' in cloudron forum) Will need another cache clear
  • PDF.js updated from 3.11 to 4.3 for security and feature changes (Thanks @Ludy87 again )
  • Backend server type changed from Tomcat to Jetty, Way faster loading, but 10% more ram... let me know if this is a good change (Also means HTTP2.0 support and some other nice features) This might cause some weird servers issues.. something to keep eye on
  • Gradle version updated to 8.7

Bugs

  • Bug causing certain tmp files to remain longer than expected

What's Changed

  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1281
  • add multi OAuth2 Provider by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1284
  • fix fr translation of "Sign" by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1283
  • Fix: remove dublicate en_GB, missing translation German by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1285
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1286
  • add: multi OAuth2 option README.md, small cosmetic repairs by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1287
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1295
  • chore: add some Chinese text translation by @wai4y in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1293
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1296
  • Cucumber testcases by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1297
  • update gradle wrapper version by @wahab95 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1292
  • Fix fr messages by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1303
  • fix: change "crop image" to "crop pdf" by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1302
  • Bump PDF.js from 3.11.174 to 4.3.118 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1300
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1304
  • Tomcat to Jetty and other changes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1307
  • fix fr messages: fix a typo "Redimensionner" by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1305
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1308
  • gha by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1309
  • add invalid Id Token message by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1311
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1317
  • UI changes credit 'dev-cb' in cloudron forum by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1318
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1319

New Contributors

  • @miniupnp made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1283
  • @wai4y made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1293
  • @wahab95 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1292

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.6...v0.25.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.25.2 Lots of bug fixes! Norwegian and Oauth changes
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Norwegian translation by @arsvendg
  • OAuth changes to not require hardcoded values (https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1390 for more info Thanks @Ludy87 )

Bug fixes

  • Fix for Flattern not working correctly
  • disabled settings.yml updating while we resolve it resetting configs....
  • custom path like /pdf now works correctly for admin page
  • customHTML error resolved
  • markdown to pdf fix

What's Changed

  • Sonar by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1362
  • Norwegian translation by @arsvendg in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1373
  • Small adjustmens to language file by @arsvendg in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1376
  • tweaks and fix for #1381 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1382
  • Minor corrections in the languages by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1389
  • Enhance OAuth2 Client Registration with Dynamic Provider Details by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1390
  • remove settings files update for now by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1388
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1391
  • resolve admin config with custom path by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1393
  • Resolve customHTML error by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1394

New Contributors

  • @arsvendg made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.25.1...v0.25.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.26.0 Pipelines fixes, bug fixes and various admin page improvements
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Language updates as always! thanks all
  • Redesigned Admin page for addUsers (thanks @Ludy87 ! )
  • Better user creation and password verification overall by @Ludy87
  • Pipeline now correctly handles JSON lists (like for OCR) Change could be breaking
  • PDF.js from 4.3.118 to 4.3.136 by @Ludy87

Bugs fixes

  • Version update check not working " too many requests" (thanks @Ludy87)
  • fixes API query, replaces password comparisons, fixes duplicate ids by @Ludy87
  • Fixes for context path changes / to /pdf etc
  • Digital signatures are now removed when doing merges (Thanks @Ludy87)

Auto generated for anything i missed! :

What's Changed

  • Add: Bypass for too many requests to the github api by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1404
  • fr messages: more translations by @SorCelien in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1405
  • New fr_FR ignore by @SorCelien in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1406
  • add: redesign addUsers.html by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1407
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1410
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1413
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1414
  • Bugfix: fixes API query, replaces password comparisons, fixes duplicate ids by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1415
  • [ImgBot] Optimize images by @imgbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1412
  • Images and login context by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1417
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1416
  • add password validator by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1418
  • Bump PDF.js from 4.3.118 to 4.3.136 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1420
  • Add template for bug issues by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1419
  • Feature request template by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1422
  • Pipeline fixes for json lists + delete func by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1425
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1423
  • Add: Option to remove the digital signature when merging by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1424
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1426
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1427
  • Bump commons-io:commons-io from 2.15.1 to 2.16.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1055
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1428
  • Bump gradle from 7.6-jdk17 to 8.0-jdk17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1371
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1429

New Contributors

  • @SorCelien made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1405
  • @imgbot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1412

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.25.3...v0.26.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.26.1 Various minor enhancements + survey
entry.content:
New Survey introduced this version, which will not pop up again after hitting don't show or after opening the survey just once We would appreciate it if you could give us some feedback on how we are doing! https://stirlingpdf.info/s/clwzgtfw7000gltkmwz1n212m

Enhancements

  • Language updates as always! thankyou all!
  • change to Pdf.js-Legacy to support older chrome versions @Ludy87
  • Odd-Even operation mode for organise feature (thanks @Skillkiller )

Bug fixes

  • contextPath issue fixes for root uri changes like /pdf etc @Ludy87
  • PDF to image producing incorrect single image results if pages are different oriantations/sizes (thanks @Skillkiller )

What's Changed

  • Update messages_ar_AR.properties by @wahab95 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1430
  • change to Pdf.js-Legacy Version 4.3.136 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1444
  • Update messages_zh_TW.properties: Translate English sentence to Chinese by @WorldOfWheat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1438
  • Bugfix: missing contextPath by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1434
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1431
  • survey by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1446
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1447
  • Add Odd-Even Merge operation mode by @Skillkiller in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1445
  • When converting PDF to Word, add parameters to speed up soffice startup by @HHHHHMMMM in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1450
  • Add missing of Ukrainian translation to the resource file by @anroypaul in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1448
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1454
  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1457
  • [ImgBot] Optimize images by @imgbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1455
  • Fixed a spelling mistake in French by @bistory in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1459
  • PDF-to-Image different page formats fix by @Skillkiller in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1460
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1461

New Contributors

  • @WorldOfWheat made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1438
  • @Skillkiller made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1445
  • @HHHHHMMMM made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1450
  • @anroypaul made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1448
  • @bistory made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1459

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.26.0...v0.26.1
